titleStmt.title: A revelation of the Revelation wherein is contayned, a most true, plaine, and briefe manifestation of the meaning and scope of all the Reuelation, and of euery mystery of the same : whereby the pope is most plainely declared and proued to bee Antichrist / by Thomas Mason ...
titleStmt.author: Mason, Thomas, 1580-1619?

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University. Library.
